mapper.select: select block.id, block.admin_user_id, block.name, block.icon, count(distinct category.id) category_sum, count(post.id) post_sum ,max(post.update_time) update_time from (select id, name, icon, admin_user_id from block) block left join (select id, block_id from category ) category on block.id = category.block_id left join (select id, category_id, update_time from post) post on category.id = post.category_id group by block.id;

select block.id, block.admin_user_id, block.name, block.icon, block.description, category.id category_id, category.name category_name, category.description category_description from block left join category on block.id = category.block_id where block.id = #{id}
